 */import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ResultsTable(_ref){let{ratings}=_ref;// Sort ratings by value in descending order
const sortedRatings=Object.entries(ratings).sort((_ref2,_ref3)=>{let[,a]=_ref2;let[,b]=_ref3;return b-a;}).map(_ref4=>{let[name,rating]=_ref4;return{name,rating};});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"ratings-list",children:sortedRatings.map((_ref5,index)=>{let{name,rating}=_ref5;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"rating-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"rank",children:index+1}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"name",children:name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"rating",children:["Rating: ",rating]})]},name);})});}export default ResultsTable;
